name: xyAlgebra Probabilities File
summary: A PRB file is a data file created by xyAlgebra, a free educational program for teaching algebra and verbal problem-solving skills. It contains probability-related data xyAlgebra references to generate problems involving probability concepts, such as chance events, ratios, or statistical outcomes, to present problems to students in an interactive or step-by-step format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
